title: Darsawan
text:
Darsawan is a village in <a href="Asoha">Asoha</a> block of <a href="Unnao%20district">Unnao district</a>, <a href="Uttar%20Pradesh">Uttar Pradesh</a>, <a href="India">India</a>. It is not connected to major district roads and has two primary schools and two medical practitioners. As of 2011, its population is 3,074, in 600 households.
The <a href="1961%20Census%20of%20India">1961 census</a> recorded Darsawan as comprising 7 hamlets, with a total population of 1,331 (697 male and 634 female), in 272 households and 228 physical houses. The area of the village was given as 1,981 <a href="acre">acre</a>s. The village had 1 <a href="grain%20mill">grain mill</a> at the time.
